data.value: Login successful

data.value: Your password has expired. Please update it

data.value: Successfully logged out

data.value: Logout failed

data.value: This account is not locked and does not require unlocking

data.value: No email is configured for this account. Please contact the system administrator

data.value: An account unlock verification email has been sent

data.value: A password reset verification email has been sent

data.name: SysUserOperateSendVcCodeSuccess
data.value: The verification code has been sent. Please check your email

data.name: SysUserOperateSendVcCodeFrequently
data.value: Too many requests. Please try again later

data.name: SysUserOperateSendVcCodeFailed
data.value: Failed to send verification code. Reason: {0}. Please contact the system administrator

data.name: SysUserOperateUnlockSendVcCodeBody
data.value: Your verification code {0} is used to unlock your account and is valid for 3 minutes. Do not share or forward it. If this was not you, please ignore this email

data.name: SysUserOperateVcCodeExpired
data.value: The verification code has expired. Please request a new one

data.name: SysUserOperateVcCodeSuccess
data.value: Verification successful. Please enter and confirm your new password

data.name: SysUserOperateVcCodeError
data.value: Invalid verification code

data.name: SysUserOperateUnlockSuccess
data.value: Account unlocked successfully

data.name: SysUserOperateUnlockFailed
data.value: Failed to unlock the account

data.name: SysUserOperatePasswordNotExpiration
data.value: The password has not expired and does not need to be reset

data.name: SysUserOperatePasswordExSendVcCodeBody
data.value: Your verification code {0} is used to reset your password and is valid for 3 minutes. Do not share or forward it. If this was not you, please ignore this email

data.name: SysUserOperateValidationPassWrodError
data.value: Password must be 8–16 characters long and include uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters

data.name: SysUserOperateUpdatePassWrodSuccess
data.value: Password updated successfully. Please log in again

data.name: SysUserOperateUpdatePassWrodFailed
data.value: Failed to update password

data.name: SysUserOperateNotEqualOldPassWord
data.value: The new password must not be the same as the old password

data.name: SysUserOperateUserNotFound
